name: Heavy Bike Racers - 3D Real Burn Out
name_original: Heavy Bike Racers - 3D Real Burn Out
description:
Lets burn those wheels on Heavy Bike Racers - 3D Real Burn Out which take high speed racing to a whole new level. Get addicted.

Time to get accelerated & drift wheels to push bike to its limit. Fantastic bikes are here waiting for their drivers and Babes are looking for those fast driving guys.

KEY FEATURES

● Real Extreme Competition with with heavy traffic
● Extremely Super Heavy Bikes & Easy Controls
● Incredible Bike Upgrades & Customize
● WiFi Single-Player Racing
● Plenty of Awesome Fast Motor Bikes
● Dangerous Tracks for High Risk Daredevils

Lets burn rubbers take out wheels to play an exiting bike racing game in town

Plenty of vehicles on track that will make your race a hell route & try to stop you but you need to drift and drive with full throttle, NOS is there to help you out so put out your driving skills and impress a lot of babes to hang out with.

Impressive Features that ll take your breath away

● Drifts
● Sports Bike
● Cool Tracks
● Awesome Graphics
● Easy Controls

Download it and Get High Rewards
